attributes.action: Provide funding for solar electricity panels for UK householders
attributes.additional_details: Solves energy crisis, carbon emissions and rising energy costs in one go
attributes.background: To help households with energy costs and reduce carbon emissions by helping to fund solar panels on every unused UK household roof

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government is only responsible for funding schemes like this in England. Funding schemes like this in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland is a matter for the devolved administrations.

The UK Government already has a range of schemes to support uptake of renewable energy generation, including the Green Deal, but we could accept a petition calling on the Government to create new grants for the installation of solar panels on homes in England.
